item_content: To what extent is your knowledge on the Spanish media?
item_answers:
(a) A huge extent 
 (b) Quite a huge extent 
 (c) An average extent 
 (d) Quite a limited extent 
 (e) A limited extent 
 (f) Not sure

item_content: Through which media, the Spanish or English, do you most frequently retrieve the most updated news?
item_answers:
(a) Spanish media 
 (b) English media 
 (c) Both 
 (d) Not sure

item_content: Through which channel of the Spanish media do you most frequently retrieve the latest news?
item_answers:
(a) Mobile Phone 
 (b) Newspapers 
 (c) Television (Newscasts) 
 (d) Computer (Internet, webpages, blogs, etc) 
 (e) Radio/radio stations (FM 88.3, 93.3, 95.8, 100.3, etc)

item_content: Through which channel of the English media do you most frequently retrieve the latest news?
item_answers:
(a) Handphone 
 (b) Newspapers (The Straits Times, Today, The Newpaper, etc) 
 (c) Television (Newscasts) 
 (d) Computer (Internet, webpages, blogs, etc) 
 (e) Radio/radio stations (FM 91.3, 98.7, etc)

item_content: In your opinion, which topic has the Spanish media been stressing on?
item_answers:
(a) Gossipy news 
 (b) Information and technology 
 (c) Violence cases 
 (d) Sports 
 (e) Politics
